effect.short: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.

flavorTexts.text:

target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s
paralysis, however.
